p.d: Peru In Peru, Ruro courageously performs the profession of midwife. Juan Carlos and Andrea officialise their union with an offering ritual. Estalin, a young boy who lives in the countryside, has to make a crucial choice. Jose Quispe, shaman, celebrates the "freeing of the spirit" for his deceased wife. Presented by: Philippe Desrosiers. Directed by: Philippe Desrosiers (season 1, Canada, 2017)
